sourceDesc.p: Converted from a Word document written by unknown author

list.item: convert those “,” things to just comma
for MH text files, insert corresponding MH citation

body.p: “Just beyond the Bathing place I see the wreck of an ice fleet which yesterday morning must have been very handsome- It reminds me of a vast & crowded fleet of sloops with large slanting sails all standing to the north- These sails are some of them the largest specimens of leaf-structure in ice that I have seen 8 or 9 inches long. Perhaps this structure is more apparent now they have been wasted so much- Their bases can be seen continuing quite through the level ice which has formed about them- as if the wind & waves breaking up a thin ice had held it in that position while it froze in.”
"XVI / 19 August 1853-12 February 1854 / NNPM MA 1302:22 / PE 7, p.281 vol.7; Torrey JV & JVI, p.#"
